level.heading: District retirement benefits.
level.text: The District shall provide retirement benefits to all employees first employed after September 30, 1987, who would otherwise have been covered under the Civil Service Retirement System pursuant to 5 U.S.C. § 8331 except those specifically excluded by law or by rule.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-27, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-621.02.
